features: BATMAN ADVENTURES ACTION FIGURES: Collect the 12-inch Batman Adventures, Batman and Bane figures with 14 armor accessories and 17 points of articulation for dynamic poses and action!
14 ARMOR ACCESSORIES: Armor up Batman and Bane with 14 interchangeable armor pieces and gadgets - providing endless looks!
AUTHENTIC COMIC STYLING: Featuring comic-inspired styling, incredible details and a meticulous sculpt that brings the Batman figures to life!
EXPAND YOUR BATMAN ADVENTURES: Build your Batman Adventures collection with Batman, The Joker, Nightwing and more for imaginative play!
PERFECT GIFTS FOR KIDS: Inspire creativity and imagination with Batman toy figures & playsets! Ideal for children who love Batman figures, these super hero toys fosters pretend play and storytelling!
Covered by the Spin Master Care Commitment. See below for full details
body.description: Introducing the Batman Adventures Battle Pack - Batman vs Bane Action Figure Set! This action-packed Batman figure is perfect for kids and collectors who wants to dive into the exciting world of Batman toys! With an impressive 17 points of articulation, the highly detailed and articulated 12-inch Batman Adventures figures can effortlessly strike heroic poses. Kids can be creative and customize Batman and Bane with 14 unique and interchangeable armor accessories. Mix and match these armor pieces to create endless looks! The authentic comic-styling, detailed sculpt and design captures makes the Batman vs Bane Set a must-have for any Batman collection! Assemble your ultimate team of Super Heroes and Super-Villains! These toys for girls and boys toys are perfect for kids that love Justice League figurines, DC multiverse, Super Hero movies collectibles, RC cars, and more! The Batman Adventures, Batman vs Bane Action Figure Set inspires creative storytelling, problem-solving, and bravery as kids create their own Batman adventures!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely fantastic. They are very poseable with great accessories. The Bane is so great. It's exactly what I wanted for this and my 7inch figures.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It's cool,but the other Bane toy is better
reviews.reviewText: The toy looks good, good details, but the pieces don't stay in place, and Bane is too skinny.The other 12inch Bane is cooler and looks better, because he is wider or more muscular...Next model....combine the size of 1st Model(larger, muscular) Bane w detail and venom tubes of the 2nd model(this one) for a better toy.As a collector i am happy, but i do like the wider muscular Bane much more.....Also...the cartoonish/comic book stlye of action figures are cooler and looker better than the real people/actors action figures....Example: all the comic book batman toys look better than the Robert Pattinson toy, comic book aquaman looks better than Jason Mamoa Toy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: Epic Showdown with Batman and Bane Action Figures
reviews.reviewText: Unleash the excitement of Gotham City with the DC Comics Batman Adventures Battle Pack, featuring iconic Batman and Bane action figures. Priced at £29.99, this dynamic set includes 14 armor accessories and promises thrilling battles and imaginative play for kids and collectors alike.The Batman Adventures action figures stand tall at 30 cm and boast an impressive 17 points of articulation, allowing for dynamic poses and action-packed scenes. With authentic comic-book styling and meticulous sculpting, these figures bring the epic battles between Batman and Bane to life.Customize your heroes and villains with 14 interchangeable armor pieces and gadgets, offering endless possibilities for creative play. Mix and match accessories to create unique looks and scenarios, enhancing the storytelling experience.Perfect for kids who love Batman and superhero adventures, this action figure set inspires creativity, problem-solving, and bravery. Whether recreating iconic scenes or imagining new adventures, the Batman Adventures Battle Pack provides hours of entertainment.The set comes packaged with two figures and 14 accessories in a beautifully printed box, making it an ideal gift for fans of DC Comics and Batman. While the quality of the accessories may not match that of the figures, they hold up well during play and add depth to the overall experience.With no apparent faults and a flawless execution, the DC Comics Batman Adventures Battle Pack earns a perfect rating of 5/5 stars. Dive into the world of Gotham City and embark on thrilling adventures with Batman and Bane!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: Batman vs Bane Action Figures Set
reviews.reviewText: This is a lovely action figure set of Batman and Bane that arrived perfectly packaged and in a big and cute box with their images, perfect to be gifted to my boys.It comes with 14 accessories and I am sure they will have great amusement at changing these pieces and gadgets to personalise the style. The paint and material seem of very good quality, with no funny smell or flaws.They can do poses and actions, however Bane is a bit wobbly and unstable most of the time.That being mentioned, the rest is perfect and will ensure lots of fun for Batman adventure lovers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I expected to these to be the smaller 4" characters, but these are huge just shy of 30cm tall.They come with numerous accessories which make customising the characters really fun, although younger kids may struggle attaching some of the accessories as they can be a bit fiddly.They're very easy to pose, and look great - my 6yo son loves these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: Epic - so cool - Bane and Batman figures
reviews.reviewText: 'Epic' and 'so cool' were what the 7 year old described Bane and Batman figures as. They're quite sturdy and very large at about a foot tall! They come with several bits and bobs to attach to each of the figures. We liked that there wasn't anything attaching the figures to the box - you know how sometimes you feel like you need to have a degree in engineering to get into some kids toys - this one you don't! Each part of the limbs is moveable which is great for more action shots, this does mean that you need to position the figures carefully to balance them for standing. Perfect for Batman fans.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This comes from a person who hates plastic toys: I was so impressed with these, I spent some time playing with these when the children opened the box!These toys do look very impressive. The Batman does have a permanent body-builder-in-a-competition stoop, like chin to the chest, shoulders forward, fist together in the crutch area, but he is still one of the best action figures we have had. The chunky villain is well made, too. He does drop his tnt's (or whatever those things are) easily - they just do not stay in place and with the lightest touch detach themselves - but the rest of the accessories are quite difficult to remove on thus figurines. A better balance of ease/difficulty would be more preferable, but they might as well have improved the next batch, maybe.The points of articulation are very impressive, well, ex hockey player level. So, yeah, they won't do all the yoga stuff, but then they won't wobble about with every shake, so they are sturdy and you can pose them quite well.I find these really well made and the best action figures that I laid my hands on, and I am really not a fan of this stuff in general.
